duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete work orders for resident service requests and perform preventative maintenance on the property.
Prepare vacant apartment homes for leasing by scheduling vendors, obtaining supplies, and completing maintenance tasks.
Maintain the grounds, common areas, and amenities by performing general cleaning and painting curbs and signage.
Assist in routine property inspections to identify safety and risk management concerns.
Obtain required EPA certifications for refrigerant recycling and valid driver’s license for operating a golf cart on property.
Comply with safety and risk-management policies, attend safety meetings, and report accidents and incidents promptly and accurately.
May inspect work performed by contractors, vendors, and service providers to verify quality standards.

education_certification.credential: EPA certifications Type 1 and II or Universal for refrigerant recycling
Valid driver's license to operate a golf cart on property
All certifications as required by State and Local jurisdictions
